name: uvalib-drupal
description: Using npm to help deploy these themes/modules to dev and prod environments

scripts.switch-latest-release: git tag | grep '^v.*' | sort -V | tail -n1 | xargs git checkout
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run switch-latest-release && export SERVER=drupal.lib.virginia.edu && npm run deploy-theme

author: Doug Chestnut <dougchestnut@gmail.com>
